alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain will impact portions of east central Jo Daviess and western Stephenson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain over Lena, or 9 miles northwest of Freeport, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, minor flooding and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Slowing or redirecting of traffic due to ponding or flowing water. Closure of waterfront access due to flooding. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Lena, Pearl City, Cedarville, Buena Vista, Orangeville, Kent, Waddams Grove, Eleroy, Red Oak, Damascus, Lake Le-Aqua- na State Park, Mc Connell, Scioto Mills, and Willow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
